title: Web search tool (DuckDuckGo scraping)
description: Free web search via DuckDuckGo HTML scraping. No API key required. Parse search results into structured format. SSRF protection like web_fetch.

logs.msg: Research complete. Wrote ai/research/web-search-2026.md. Key findings: DDG HTML scraping (html.duckduckgo.com/html/) is best zero-config option. Brave Search API (2k free/mo) is best upgrade path. ~320 lines total. Use reqwest + scraper crate. No viable existing Rust crates. SSRF protection needed. ion already has web_fetch - only need web_search tool.
Implemented web_search tool: scraper dep, DDG HTML POST, redirect URL unwrapping, 5 unit tests, clippy clean
